HotelElement.Name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London - Westminster

Description.Text: Please note the hotel offers Full English Breakfast.

The hotel is centrally located in Westminster, within easy reach of Westminster Abbey, the Houses of Parliament, the London Eye and Buckingham Palace. The bright lights of Piccadilly Circus and Leicester Square are a short underground journey.

The medium-sized rooms are superbly appointed with beautiful light wooden furnishings and pure white bed linen. All rooms feature individually controlled air conditioning, flat screen television with a fully interactive satellite TV system, CD players with library, two telephone lines, high speed internet connection, mini-bar, personal safe and power showers. Bathrooms, are in excellent condition.
This is a modern, contemporary building.

Millbank Lounge - Millbank Lounge is located on the first floor its charismatic design and rich inspirational atmosphere combined with the high quality service to create the perfect surroundings for business or pleasure. Enjoy bar bites chill out treats and drinks inclu. City Cafe - Westminster City Cafe offers a fantastic London Dining experience with award winning cuisine amidst the stylish surrounding of Art Street. Our award winning Chefs skillfully and carefully prepare our food from locally sourced quality ingredients to give o.
The large lobby is extremely well furnished and decorated in a contemporary style in keeping with the theme of the hotel. There is a separate entrance for groups if desired.
